tastingNotes.nose: Toasted oats, honey, chocolate chips, blueberries, vanilla, orange blossom, spice
tastingNotes.palate: Creamy vanilla latte, dark chocolate, dried cherries, peppermint, root beer spices
tastingNotes.finish: Spicy with mint oil, savory oak, coffee bean; medium length

tastingNotes.nose: Vanilla, rose water, caramel, puff pastry, whipping cream, poached pear
tastingNotes.palate: Cornbread, caramel, light fruits, baking spices
tastingNotes.finish: Soft, with subtle molasses and mild spice; short and refreshing

tastingNotes.nose: Caramel, rose petal, cinnamon, citrus zest, vanilla
tastingNotes.palate: Walnuts, prunes, spices, lavender, acid balance, burnt caramel
tastingNotes.finish: Medium, with lingering dark fruit, cinnamon, and woody notes

tastingNotes.nose: Toffee, orange peel, herbs, honey, leather, oak
tastingNotes.palate: Bold, dry, delicate; candied almonds, rich cocoa, vanilla
tastingNotes.finish: Dry and lingering; cinnamon, cloves, black pepper

tastingNotes.nose: Spicy rye bread, herbal mint, caramel, vanilla, toasted oak
tastingNotes.palate: Bold rye spice, caramel, dried fruits, baking spices, light citrus
tastingNotes.finish: Medium, with lingering rye heat, vanilla, and subtle oak

tastingNotes.palate: Caramel, light oak, honey, peanuts, cinnamon
tastingNotes.finish: Medium, with caramel, peanuts, honey sweetness, mild burn

tastingNotes.nose: Vanilla, caramel, light fruit, oak, subtle spice
tastingNotes.palate: Smooth caramel, vanilla, toasted nuts, mild spice
tastingNotes.finish: Short, with lingering vanilla and light oak

tastingNotes.nose: Toffee, brown sugar, vanilla, toasted oak, cinnamon apple, orange
tastingNotes.palate: Sweet caramel, toasted oak, cinnamon sugar, soft pepper, orange, apple
tastingNotes.finish: Smooth medium, with toasted brown sugar, citrus, lingering pepper

tastingNotes.nose: Cabernet grape, dark berry, vanilla, caramel, oak, subtle spice
tastingNotes.palate: Rich berry, chocolate, vanilla, tannic oak, baking spices
tastingNotes.finish: Medium, with lingering dark fruit, vanilla, and mild tannin

tastingNotes.palate: Chewy caramel, vanilla, dried cherry, graham cracker, pie crust spices, soft oak

tastingNotes.nose: Toasted oak, vanilla, caramel, dried fruit, subtle spice

tastingNotes.nose: Rich oak, vanilla, caramel, dark fruit, spice
